text: Bluffton may refer to: ==Places in Canada== *Bluffton, Alberta ==Places in the United States== * Bluffton, Alabama * Bluffton, Arkansas * Bluffton, Georgia * Bluffton, Indiana * Bluffton, Minnesota * Bluffton, Ohio **Bluffton University * Bluffton, Texas * Bluffton, South Carolina * Bluffton Township, Minnesota ==Other== *Bluffton Movement, 1844, South Carolina political group
title: Bluffton
